But, wait a minute!

There are no developers.

We have a major tech shortage.

Who will run our digital domain?

These messages are constant; often a collective panic from the media, government, and private sector...Sometimes even the tech industry, itself!

Indeed, the world needs more developers.

Here they are.

I've seen these guys' and gals' work ethic, checked out their projects, engaged in seriously nerdy (read: awesome) tech conversations. These people are the next generation of butt-kickin' developers. Why else would I feature them? Welcome to the Dev Spotlight Series.

Yeah, so...Who are you, again?
